intro.subtitle: Clara Maestri - frontend developer
intro.alt: a gif of the moon and clouds

about.title: Hello I'm
about.text: I started my journey as a frontend developer in 2022, seeking challenges that I could solve using logic and creativity at the same time. I specialize in developing responsive interfaces
about.alt: Clara holding Frodo, a tabby cat. This image has a round purple background with the moon and stars

projects.alt: this image shows the project in different resolutions: mobile, desktop and tablet
projects.ariaLabel: click here to view the project
projects.floppa: a homage to my favorite animal, the caracal, made using React
projects.agidoc: a prototype of a contract signing system, using React and Redux
projects.theo: a fan club for my dog Theo, using Angular
projects.films: a website for a streaming platform, using HTML/CSS/Js, JsonServer and Bootstrap
projects.kimetsu: a React project about the anime Demon Slayer, with a changeable theme using Styled Components
projects.batcat: A library of all my favorite musical genre's albuns, using React and Redux
projects.techcat: A technology library e-commerce, using React e Redux
projects.gym: An admin dashboard for a gym, using ContextAPI and styled with Styled Components
projects.horror: A website for a horror movie streaming platform, using React and Redux
projects.vet: A website for a vet clinic, using HTML/CSS/Js and Bootstrap, made in a coding dojo
projects.rick: Fansite about the show Rick and Morty, using ContextAPI and styled with Styled Components
